016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
023import java.net.InetAddress;
024import java.net.URI;
025import java.net.UnknownHostException;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.List;
028
029/**
030 * Configuration wrapper for instance configuration
031 *
032 * @author rickardoberg
033 * @since 20/04/2022
034 */
035public record InstanceConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
036    public static InstanceConfiguration get(Configuration configuration)
037    {
038        return new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance"));
039    }
040
041    public String getId() {
042        return configuration.getString("id").orElse(null);
043    }
044
045    public String getHost() {
046        return configuration.getString("host").orElse(null);
047    }
048
049    public String getFQDN() {
050        return configuration.getString("fqdn").orElse(null);
051    }
052
053    public InetAddress getIp() {
054        return configuration.getString("ip").map(ip ->
055        {
056            try {
057                return InetAddress.getByName(ip);
058            } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
059                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
060            }
061        }).orElseGet(() ->
062        {
063            try {
064                return InetAddress.getLocalHost();
065            } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
066                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
067            }
068        });
069    }
070
071    public String getDomain() {
072        return configuration.getString("domain").orElse(null);
073    }
074
075    public String getEnvironment() {
076        return configuration.getString("environment").orElse(null);
077    }
078
079    public List<String> getTags() {
080        return configuration.getListAs("tags", JsonNode::textValue).orElse(Collections.emptyList());
081    }
082
083    public String getHome() {
084        return configuration.getString("home").orElseGet(() ->
085        {
086            try {
087                return new File(".").getCanonicalPath();
088            } catch (IOException e) {
089                return new File(".").getAbsolutePath();
090            }
091        });
092    }
093
094    public String getResources() {
095        return configuration.getString("resources").orElse(null);
096    }
097
098    public URI getURI() {
099        return configuration.getURI("uri").orElseThrow();
100    }
101}
